Hi everyone! Welcome to Matych Animations! 
This is channel with animations for games such as Garten of BanBan!:)


All videos are made with CapCut
They are edited in a way to provide the viewer with a new visual and listening experience.
The sounds and images are Creative Commons.
I make a preview in the Canva image editor.. The audio and video sources in this video were created in such a way that the viewer hears and sees the new UNIQUE content.


All my video features materials protected by the Fair Use guidelines of Section 107 of Copyright Act. It takes about 4 hours to create these videos so that my viewers can feel the difference between the original video and the video I created.))

Thanks for watching!:)
